name: classifiable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be put into a group of things of a particular type: His prose works are not easily classifiable. Harry Potter readers are not classifiable by age or ethnicity. See
classify
More examplesFewer examplesThe foundation would not be classifiable as a publishing enterprise.It would appear that all music not classifiable as classical is considered to be Jazz.I need to know if this man has a classifiable mental disorder.
